reviews.title: best game ever group
reviews.comment: This is the best game i play  in my life. I hope G5 will create  a better game than this love this games so much.
reviews.author: xavier chong

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Good game.just need more time to enjoy it..overall its 5 star awesome.
reviews.author: Jun Silang

reviews.title: A good game
reviews.comment: This is one of the best games ever just needs a rotating thaing to turns the buildings but still this is a good game better than city vill 1 and 2
reviews.author: Jeffrey Webber

reviews.title: Mobile Gamer
reviews.comment: Great App!! i love the fact that u can create ur own city its just a very good app loving it
reviews.author: Jesus Armenta

reviews.title: Such a nice game
reviews.comment: I love this game~it\'s fun and the quality is good. Keep going!~I am looking forward to have more new function.
reviews.author: Tse Connie

reviews.title: Great Game
reviews.comment: I like everything about it apart from the difficulty of getting city credits. Can it please be easier as I don\'t have Facebook and I don\'t go onto my Nexus 7 every day. Fix this and its 5 stars:-)
reviews.author: Johnny Sargeant

reviews.title: Nothing to brag about..
reviews.comment: Needs bigger fonts and better source instructions and guide introduction.  No errors, Just retarded to need facebook to earn dollars to \302\260buy\302\260 buildings and etc.
reviews.author: joseph bowman

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: This game is addictive... works realy nice on galaxy note... would love it if we get daily bonus too... but else wise its a one good game to spend time on....
reviews.author: kunal joshi

reviews.title: Wish I could give it 100 stars
reviews.comment: The very best game I have,played and I have had,a Android phone for 4years,.so it is safe to say that I have played a lot of games, my favorite games are the ones where you build a city, village, colony..ect ect.. You get the point... in this game not only do you build a city buy you build a working city with government, infrastructure, ect,ect.... I highly recommend...
reviews.author: Tony Perry

reviews.title: This game is cool and helped me to get happy
reviews.comment: Cool
reviews.author: Victoria Evans

reviews.title: Very fun
reviews.comment: Very good game graphics are excellent and the animations are fun to watch....runs very smooth
reviews.author: Matt Mauer

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: Awesome, addictive,  fun, easy to play
reviews.author: Asif Rehmani

reviews.title: Great game so far
reviews.comment: Amazing game play...decent graphics for a mobile. Could have been less irritating if it doesn\'t ask for connecting with facebook constantly. Also, goals that are asked may not be feasible sometimes as credit might not be enough always. Other than that, intriguing game
reviews.author: Karan Singh Raghuvanshi

reviews.title: I absouluteley love this game
reviews.comment: I absouluteley love this game but to get throgh it you need more invest points so you cant really get through it unless you buy it out of real money. I think that you shoud be able to buy invest points whith the game money but i don\'t know how you get people to the hotels. Please help!!! If you do i will make it 5 stars again. Please reply need help ASAP!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wow
reviews.comment: This game is fun. I wish you could share it to twitter or instagram , since i dont have a facebook.. But other then that its awsome. ! P.s. Wish it didnt take up so much space!
reviews.author: Simone Wiliams

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: A really great game, loads of fun will keep you entertained for hours
reviews.author: Vicky Padley

reviews.title: Need another way to get investment points
reviews.comment: This is a good game but investment points need to be able to come by without buying them. You should be able to buy them with your coins if you have a decent amount or offer them more often in the achievements. Also you should be able to unlock environment things quicker too so you can make your people happier.
reviews.author: Samantha Dotson

reviews.title: Ok game
reviews.comment: Kool game. BUT u have to spend money to progress more in the game. Uninstall is the best solution when you\'re stuck with millions and can\'t go on any further.
reviews.author: Raymond Bravante

reviews.title: Very cool fun addictive.
reviews.comment: Very very fun love it very a addictive.
reviews.author: Mark McGuire

reviews.title: Bit to Dictating
reviews.comment: I will soon give it away I think as i am getting told to constantly interact with facebook but i dont want to do it, nice strategy game but so much overdemanding with little freedom of choice
reviews.author: Tom Murray
